
---
title: 'iPhone 1001 元立减券再来：京东 Apple 自营 618 狂促开启'
categories: 
 - 新媒体
 - IT 之家
 - 热榜
headimg: 'https://img14.360buyimg.com/pop/jfs/t1/216578/34/14150/121785/62286978E1a6f4ef0/b6b32191c26d161b.jpg'

comments: false
date: Wed, 15 Jun 2022 07:05:32 GMT

---

<div>   
<p data-vmark="1355">Apple 产品京东自营旗舰店现已开启“618 高潮期 ”狂促活动，主会场可领 iPhone 13 手机 1001 元大额补贴券：<a href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-iosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BAOgJK1olXDYDZBoCUBVIMzZNXhpXVhgcFR0DFxcIWDoXSQVJQ1pSCQNDWBlSWyhcBVlCIlYHAghYTB5JUG9TXwNzDmBkJx9VQ0N2cC0WQwRACU8dDRsBVXtcHRp1YSxBVGN0Ni5ZAB52W2l_ZBhlUQoyUV9ZCU4nAG0PGV0RWAUFZD06ZhFTexpSXzB9bQQDUV9cAHtcbW44GFoXXQcDVVtUD3sXBGsKHVMSVAEFU1hbOEsfBF9UWQlUHzYyZF1tOHsVM2w4RTUUDgYCAVZZXCVKAS9LUw4THGgGV15UAUMfBl8KGloXXzYy" data-androidurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-uwpurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-wxmpurl="ithome://openmp?appid=wx91d27dbf599dff74&path=%2fpages%2funion%2fproxy%2fproxy%3fspreadUrl%3dhttps%253a%252f%252funion-click.jd.com%252fjdc%253fe%253d%2526p%%26EA_PTAG%3d17078.27.380">点此前往</a>。</p><p data-vmark="a405" style="text-align: left;">本次还可叠加京东无门槛红包，每天抽三次，即抽即用：<a href="https://u.jd.com/JwxmjrY" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://u.jd.com/JLx5OnY" data-iosurl="https://u.jd.com/JIxhk9h" data-androidurl="https://u.jd.com/Jwx5L6v" data-uwpurl="https://u.jd.com/JKx5Sow" data-wxmpurl="ithome://openmp?appid=wx91d27dbf599dff74&path=%2fpages%2funion%2fproxy%2fproxy%3fspreadUrl%3dhttps%253a%252f%252fu.jd.com%252fJC4tJ53%26EA_PTAG%3d17078.27.380">点此抽红包</a>。</p><p data-vmark="fafa">抢到券 1001 元后， iPhone 13 128g 版预计 4998 元，256g 版 5798 元。</p><p data-vmark="2efa">大额券 17 日晚 8 点可用，可能会有“立减优惠”可叠加，实付到手价或许会持平 6 月 1 日售价：</p><dir><a contenteditable="false"
